author: rooneg
msg: (ra_svn_get_repos_root): if we don't have the repository root cached in
the connection, return an error indicating a mismatch between the client
and server.  this fixes a segfault when 'svn blame' is used over ra_svn

author: kfogel
msg: Always mention DB_TXN_NOSYNC in the db/DB_CONFIG file, just keep it

author: kfogel
msg: Fix infinite loop when using "." as a target dir in svn:externals.
The fix is to prevent such values from ever being set or received, by
extending the work done for ".." in revision 6639.
setting the property, to make sure the value is valid.

author: sussman
msg: This bug is so silly, I can't even think of a witty comment.

author: cmpilato
msg: (notify): Add a '.' to the "Update complete" string (makes it
consistent with the other <Operation> complete strings).
